title: Looking for a woman to discuss relationship and sexual issues with
text:
Am looking for a woman to discuss some relationship and sexual issues with :)

Talk only. 

Basically I have the desire for a sort of "cuckold" type relationship but not sure it's really OK and would like to discuss the issue with a woman to get a real female perspective. Whether or not you would have any interest in the concept is not important....I just want to get the female perspective.

This post may seem a bit long winded because what I desire would not really be defined as a "cuckold" situation so it really needs some explanation.

OK...here goes.

My desire would be to establish some kind of friendship with a woman who is either already in a relationship or would be looking to start one....but just not with me (at least not sexually). It would be understood that I would not have the option of sex with this female friend. Ever. This is a bit different than the traditional cuckold situation where the desire is to have the wife or significant other etc. hook up with other men. My desire is not to be the husband or boyfriend in this situation, nor do I have any desire to watch her with her current or new partner or any of that kind of thing. It's just the *concept* that fuels my desire.

I have (of course) read about the psychology of "cuckolding" and it's claimed that the motivation is humiliation/degradation and so forth but I don't feel it's really that with me. In my imagination the woman would be some combination of dominant/charismatic/beautiful basically someone "out of my league" perhaps. In reality of course it would not *need* to go down this way - it could be anyone really. But the point is this is in my opinion really more of a "madonna/whore" issue with me than anything about humiliation. 

But even so I'm not sure it's really OK. Not sure it's really OK for *either* party and that's what I want to discuss.

To me the "traditional" cuckold situation does not usually make sense for the woman. Doesn't she want her primary partner to be strong and smart and cool and loyal and so forth? I would think so. So I think that entering into a *relationship* where I would *ask* my partner to hook up with others and degrade me in the process would not be fair to her and not something most (any?) women would really want. 

But entering into a friendship with a woman who is in a relationship already or where it's understood that she can/will do that if she wants to feels different. And it feels more OK. But I'm not sure and would really appreciate female input on it. Another question is what about the other male. Would any men really be OK with this? As a guy myself I can figure that angle out a bit better.

I'm not looking for group sex or to even *see* this putative woman have sex with her partner. It's just the idea that she is in fact either in a relationship or free to enter into one....whereas I am forever barred from having sex with her...but am her loyal friend. This concept of denial is why I use the term "cuckold". For some reason -in my head- my motivation to remain "friends" would be compromised if she *did* have sex with me! In my head she's beautiful and someone I couldn't get in any case. 

What's the difference between this situation and just being friends with a woman? 

The difference is that it is officially on the table that I would not be getting sex ever. For some weird reason that makes all the difference.

With a normal m-f friendship sex/love/relationship is always a theoretical possible and is perpetually lurking in the background. Maybe one of them goes through a divorce....and then...?? But in this case the "no sex" thing is officially on the table and for me that drives a certain motivation. As I said above I will typically imagine the woman to be some combination of beautiful/charismatic or dominant. A business executive like Carly Fiorina maybe. Amy Schumer maybe. She is so confident and so cool.

Maybe the "real" motivation is "social climbing". I want to get into the club but don't have the credentials. In which case this is NOT OK. But maybe it's just compromise. Maybe it's part of human sexual nature. We are not 100% monogamous you know.

I do crave/desire a more traditional wife down the line also.

It would be great to find a woman to discuss these issues with!

title: BBW Bakery
text:
I've posted this ad a few times in the past and actually made plans a few times, but in the end it has always fallen through. However, recent experiences have taught me that life is really too short not to try again.

This is a long-standing and ultimately pretty innocent fantasy. I'm looking for an attractive. confident BBW, dressed to the nines, who'll invite me over to her place, strip me down to my underwear and hit me with a bunch of pies. And that's it - strange, maybe, but straightforward. It is what it is, and if you're interested in being that BBW I'll be happy to explain it further.

Obviously I could pay a professional to do this, but I think it'd be more fun to do it with someone who's in it purely for shits and giggles and will genuinely enjoy the experience.

I will bring the pies, although if you really want to provide them yourself that's fine. (Actually it'd be great as pies are not cheap, but this seems like an unrealistic expectation.)

I will pie you in return if you want, but it's not essential. What I've described above is as far as I expect anything to go. If you have other interests that can easily be incorporated into this scenario, I'm open to that, but I put this ad in Strictly Platonic because those are my expectations.

If you aren't a BBW and still want to do this we can discuss it, although the "W" portion of BBW is non-negotiable. And if you're a size 6 or under, this is the rare ad that isn't for you -- for some reason I've always imagined a BBW doing the pieing. If you're a cute BBW who's also a psychologist and can give me some insight into why I've wanted to do this for something like 20 years, you'll go to the front of the line.

I'm a SWM, 41, 6'2", presentable, intelligent, employed and a decent human being. Your pic gets mine. Put "BBW Pies" in your subject line if you feel like proving that you read the whole ad.

title: The calmness of the river, the beauty of the moon...
text:
So my post may not be completely platonic. But I choose to post it here, because the reason is simple - the hope that there maybe a lot more "real" women reading this section. So here goes my story:

You will perhaps read this out loud, doing an incredulous double-take. You could've written every word of my post - perhaps because you are living my exact same mirrored life. Its funny to think someone else in cyberland wears my exact tarnished armor? My life with many highs: the success of my profession, the accomplishments and so many things to look forward to, and the lows: the emptiness, the utter lack of romance, friendship and passion! Yup, inner angst, sleepless nights and volumes of unanswered questions. 

Second guessing and lots of introspection is the new normal. Like you, no one would believe I live such an imperfect life. From the outside, and from everyone that knows me - I'm perfect and the model husband and family man. The man, every friend wants to be, the role model of all my young(er) acquaintances.

To show you just the tip of the iceberg: My wife of many years is someone I sleep next to as we are complete strangers. *Sigh*. How about a cup of coffee and conversation sometime? Or a chat on instant messenger about this craziness? Figure it out? I suspect we would instantly understand each other's drama without using words -- because we share the same story and find ourselves at same intersection & crossroads.

If you would like a chat, perhaps finding comfort or a laugh about this, let me know? Or a chat, i have both Hangouts and Kik messengers.

title: Untitled long post.
text:
A fine day to exit

There are days I wonder to myself is it really is a fine day to exit. 
I hate having to fight off such thoughts that become as natural as breathing.
It's amazing how you can be surrounded, and yet feel so alone. 
Does the world understand my feelings? Am I alone? 
It's easy to think so.

Am I good enough for you? Can I live up to your expectations.
When will you decide to leave? 
Please stick around. 
How long before my insecurities leak through, and I inadvertently push 
you away?

Who I am

To paint a word with pictures I can be considered ordinary on the surface. 
People close to me would never imagine those are thoughts that run through my head.
On the outside they see me as Friendly, quiet, and introverted. I can make you laugh, and
crack jokes. I can act silly too. I can also be socially anxious, and try to find a way out. 

You can say I'm disciplined. 
You can call me passionate. 
You can say I'm a loser. 
You can say I'm creative, or you can say I'm crazy.

My heroes are ordinary men. Men who have changed the realm of computing.
Men who I look up to and hope to follow in their footsteps. It's not the fame, and
fortune that drives them. Only passion. 

I will get looked over.
I will get passed by.
No second thoughts given. 

Expressing myself in destructive ways with a box cutter is familiar.
To help release myself from pain. Some days it makes perfect sense.
Today I had those thoughts, and today I just chose to write. 

Her

If I ever do find love, hopefully I make her feel special. 
Instead of going out to fancy dinners, we can cook it ourselves, and have fun.
Instead of going out to the movies, we can watch something together. 
Going to the mall is okay, but the scenery in a park is much more vibrant, and colorful. 
Instead of buying cards at a store, she'll appreciate me making her one. 

I hope you enjoyed reading this, because I enjoyed typing it.

title: Putting myself back together..
text:
The past several years haven't been the best to me.
I've been depressive, anxious, self doubting, harmful to myself, and all of this
hidden away from the world, because quite frankly, I didn't feel like I belonged. 

Recently I've been in the mindset of just finally just putting myself back together, 
finding a job, and making it the best possible year. I deserve to that much for myself.
A part of me just wants to enjoy life again. 

As far as my personality goes, if you ask anyone close to me you'll get varied answers, and 
none of them are bad. Friendly, quiet, and polite. I like to mind my own business, and keep
to myself. I'm a private person for the most part. I live at home, and I don't own a car. 
Public transportation isn't an issue for me as it's very accessible.

Overall this is a way for me to reach out to someone who might feel the same way, or 
would like to get to know me better, and see where things go.

title: The Power of Cuddling
text:
The act of cuddling holds much power. It has the ability to give us with warmth, comfort, security, and peace in the mind and heart. You channel your focus on the here and now - the very moment of being in close intimacy in the arms of another person - letting go of all your stress and troubles for a while. Cuddling allows us to experience safe and respectful touch; it teaches us to love and appreciate another person and ourselves. Cuddling promotes trust; it has the power to soften and open up a closed heart, and heal a wounded heart. 

Do yourself and someone else a favor - find a cuddle buddy. :)
